| HistoryText             = '''[[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]]'s Artificial Intelligence Division''' special unit tasked with  managing threats from and affairs with artificial intelligences.{{r|Avengers A.I. Vol 1 1}}

The former division chief, [[Bill Parker (Earth-616)|Bill Parker]], worked with [[Henry Pym (Earth-616)|Dr. Hank Pym]] on the Belgrade/Jocasta-Max Operation. However, when "[[Dimitrios (Earth-616)|Dimitrios]]" hacked into the [[Barack Obama (Earth-616)|the President]]'s email, Parker was sacked and [[Monica Chang (Earth-616)|Agent Monica Chang]] became the new Division Chief.{{r|Avengers A.I. Vol 1 1}}
